data.rule_content:
Welcome to luck, a raffle and playing platform operated by Gavin Ventures Inc., licensed under . By using our platform, you agree to the following terms:

1. play

  • There are two main playing modes:

    • Sold Out Mode
      The raffle begins with a fixed number of tickets available. The playing ends once all tickets are sold, and then a winner is drawn.
       
    • Time Limit Mode
      The raffle has a fixed duration. If minimum sales are reached, a winner is drawn at the set time.
       
  • Minimum bet per ticket is ₱1.00.
     
  • Tickets can be purchased using either your Cash Wallet balance or Lucky Coin Wallet balance. Each raffle draw has a maximum ticket limit per person to ensure fair play and give all participants an equal chance of winning. This can be found on each Raffle Draw Info Panel as shown below.
  • Upon ticket purchase, the system will assign a unique Ticket Reference ID per entry.
     
  • Bets are final and must be placed before draw deadlines.
     
  • Purchasing at least one ticket automatically allows you to Create a Team where you can invite players to join your personal Raffle Team for a greater chance to win prizes or earn Lucky Coins, which can then be used to get discounts and other exclusive items.

 

 

  • Exchange Rate: 1 Peso = 10 Lucky Coins
     
  • WIN A FORTUNE BAG. If a member of your team wins the raffle prize, all members of the said team (excluding the actual winner) will receive a Fortune Bag.

    The Fortune Bag is automatically awarded to the team of the raffle prize winner and serves as a consolation prize for the other team members who didn't win the Raffle Prize.

    It contains Lucky Coins, which are evenly distributed among the said team members.
     
  • LUCKY COINS. Lucky Coins can be used to get discounts when purchasing raffle draw tickets, giving players more chances to win exciting prizes.
    There are several ways to get Lucky Coins:

    1. Win a Fortune Bag. 
    See the previous section “Win a Fortune Bag” for more details.

    2. Invite Friends to Join luck
    Refer to the “Invite Friends” section for more information.

    3. Redeem a Code
    Claim Lucky Coins using a Redeem Code. See “Lucky Coins → Redeem Lucky Coins” for details. Stay tuned to our official social media accounts (ex. Facebook, etc.) for you to get our latest marketing promotion updates and a chance to receive a code.

 

  • LUCK VOUCHERS. luck vouchers let you enjoy discounts when joining raffle draws, helping you save money and play more for a chance to win a prize. 

    • Spend & Save Vouchers
      Get a discount when you spend a certain amount.
      Example: Spend ₱100, get ₱20 off.
       
    • No Minimum Vouchers
      No minimum spend required—just use the voucher directly.
      Example: Get ₱5 off instantly.
       
    • Item-Specific Vouchers
      These only apply to certain raffle items.
      Example: A ₱10 off voucher for a specific Raffle Prize.

      You can get vouchers by claiming them in the app or by completing tasks like signing up, inviting friends, or spending a set amount. During checkout, valid vouchers will show up automatically, and you can choose which one to use—just note that vouchers and Lucky Coins can’t be used together, and the system will automatically apply the better discount. Only 1 voucher can be used in a single transaction.

      Each voucher can be used once, won’t be returned after use or canceled raffles, and will expire after a set time if unused.

      See “Account → My Vouchers → Rules” for more info.

 

  • VIEW ALL ORDERS. You can track all your raffle draw entries by clicking on the View All Orders tab. This section is divided into three categories:

    • Active
      Raffle tickets that are currently pending or awaiting results.
       
    • Ended
      Raffle tickets that have already been drawn. This section includes three subcategories:

      • Lost – Tickets that did not win.
      • Prize Won – Tickets that won a raffle prize.
      • Lucky Coin Won – Tickets that earned Lucky Coins through a Fortune Bag.
         
    • Refund
      All Raffle Tickets that are cancelled and funds refunded back to your luck Wallet.

       
  • Raffle draws use randomized and -compliant RNG systems.

     
  • luck may cancel or reschedule draws in Sold Out Mode. In Sold Out Mode, if all tickets are not sold within 120 days, the raffle draw will be deemed cancelled, and the amount paid for all purchased tickets will be refunded back to the players.

     
  • 10.00% of the Net Revenue is given to OKCares Foundation Inc. to support ’s community-building initiatives.
     

2. Prizes

  • After a Player wins the Raffle Prize, a system prompt will appear, allowing the Player to choose their final preferred Prize option: Cash Prize (primary) or the corresponding Item Prize (alternative). Don’t miss out! Prizes expire 7 days after winning.
     
  • Winners are required to initiate the prize claim procedure by contacting customer support within seven (7) calendar days from the date of winning. Non-compliance within the specified timeframe shall constitute automatic forfeiture of the prize with no obligation for the platform to distribute the award.

     

 

  • The Item Prize refers to a physical or virtual item that has the same monetary equivalent as the Cash Prize being drawn.
     
  • Winners are chosen randomly and Prizes will be given to the winner within 30 days.
     
  • Winners must confirm their delivery address in "My Raffle Tickets → Order Detail." If no confirmation is made, the prize will be shipped to the original address used during payment. 
     
  • The platform will process and ship Physical prize/s within 7 business days, and will provide a Tracking Number for reference. 
     
  • Virtual prize/s will be credited to the winner’s account within 24 hours or made available in the order details section with the necessary redemption details (e.g., card number and password).
     
  • When a player wins and selects the Cash Prize, they must send an email with their preferred payment method details to luck Customer Support. The support email is displayed immediately upon selecting the Cash Prize option.

    Once verified, the cash prize will be processed and sent to the player’s chosen payment method within seven days, along with a transaction receipt.

     
  • Winners will be notified via:


 

  • Orders page
  • Winners Tab
  • Message Center & SMS Notification
     
  • App Homepage
     
  • Valid ID is required for prize collection.
     
  • If the original prize is unavailable due to circumstances, it may be substituted with cash or an alternative of similar value at luck's sole discretion.
     
  • Issues regarding Prize/s will be duly resolved within 60 calendar days.
     
  • All taxes incurred in relation to the prize(s) won are the responsibility of the winner.
     
  • This platform is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or associated in any way with Apple Inc.
     
  • Recipients of major prizes (e.g., vehicles, real estate) should note that prize transfer will require processing time and completion of legal documentation.

3. Eligibility

  • You must be 21 years or older and a resident of the Philippines.
     
  • The following are not allowed to play: luck and employees, their families, individuals on the Restricted Persons List, those who opted for self-exclusion, foreign nationals and other individuals restricted by Philippine law.

4. Accounts

  • One account per person. Use only valid personal info (email, mobile number, etc.).
     
  • You're responsible for keeping your login credentials secure.
     
  • We may request ID verification (KYC) anytime. Non-compliance shall lead to account investigation and/or suspension.

5. Gross playing Revenue (GGR) Computation

  • luck GGR is calculated as follows:

    GGR = Total Ticket Sales - Total Prizes Awarded

    where:

    Total Ticket Sales:
    The full amount of money collected from all users who purchased luck Raffle Draw Tickets.

    Total Prizes Awarded:
    The total monetary value of all the prizes given out to luck Raffle Draw winners.

6. Forfeiture Policy

  • Suspicious activity shall lead to investigation and/or or account suspension. Accounts of ineligible and banned users shall be closed and funds forfeited in favor of the Philippine government.

7. Responsible playing

  • Play responsibly. Tools are available to help manage play time and spending.
     
  • Playing in public spaces (schools, offices, churches, etc.) is prohibited.
     
  • You may request self-exclusion at any time via Customer Support.

8. Security & Fair Play

  • Fraud, cheating, use of bots, or multiple accounts is strictly prohibited.
     
  • Any suspicious activity will lead to investigation, suspension, or a permanent ban.

9. Privacy

  • We comply with the Data Privacy Act of 2012.
     
  • Your data is used only for operations, legal compliance, or marketing—with your consent.

10. Liability

  • We are not responsible for technical issues, account misuse, or internet failures.
     
  • Our maximum liability is limited to the value of your last valid bet.

11. Changes to Terms

  • These Terms may change anytime upon prior approval of . Updates will be posted on the platform.
     
  • Continued use of luck means you accept the latest terms.

12. Legal

  • These Terms and Conditions follow Philippine laws. 

13. Support

Need help? Our 24/7 Customer Support is available through our Help Center or official social media pages.
data.desc:
realme Buds T300（Global Version）：
Port charge

  • USB Type-C

Charging

  • USB Type C wired charging

Bluetooth Version

  • Bluetooth 5.3


Audio codecs

  • AAC, SBC

Wireless Range

  • 10m

Size of sound

  • 12,4mm

Battery capacity

  • Charging case:460mAh; Single earbud: 43mAh
    Charging Time
  • Charging Case + Buds:10mins Charging for 7hrs Playback (50% Volume,ANC OFF)

Waterproof Rating

  • IP55 (earphones only)

Noise Cancelling Features

  • 30dB Active Noise Cancelling, Environment Noise Cancelling

Battery (Charging case + Buds)

  • Music playback 40hrs (50% Volume,ANC OFF); Music playback 30hrs (50% Volume,ANC ON)

Battery (Earbuds Alone)

  • 8hrs Music Playback (50% Volume,ANC OFF); 6hrs Music Playback (50% Volume,ANC ON); 4hrs Calling Time (50% Volume,ANC OFF/ON)

Inside the box

  • Realme Buds T300 x 1
  • Charging Cable Type C x 1
  • Information Card x1/
  • S/M/L Silicone Eartips x 2
